DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to investigate the effect of supplement containing L-arabinose and indigestible dextrin on body mass index, body fat mass, abdominal circumference, visceral fat mass, and serum biochemical parameters in overweight subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of the Combination of L-Arabinose and Indigestible Dextrin on Obesity
DOC.criteria: Healthy as based on medical history and physical examination BMI between 25 and 30 kg/m2 Willing not to serve as blood donor during the study Informed consent signed Female subjects who are pregnant or nursing a child Participation in any clinical trial up to 90 days before Day 01 of this study Renal or hepatic dysfunction Heart disease Under medication Subjects who are taking functional food designed for weight loss or serum lipid reduction
